snippet: A United Nations panel found the presence of a chemical that can be used in the production of weapons using sarin, in what some outside analysts said could implicate the Syrian government.
abstract: United Nations inquiry into use of chemical weapons in Syria discovers presence of chemical Hexamine, used in sarin gas, in samples taken from Damascus suburb; discovery could further implicate Syrian government.
lead_paragraph: A United Nations panel found the presence of a chemical that can be used in the production of weapons using sarin, in what some outside analysts said could implicate the Syrian government.

headline.main: Report Detail Could Further Implicate Syria in Chemical Attack, Analysts Say
headline.print_headline: Report Detail Could Further Implicate Syria in Chemical Attack, Analysts Say
